entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
